We are iNetUniSon that for more than 20 years we stayed as Internet Unison. We are the area in charge of giving this service to the university community and the general public. We are the Information Services Department of the University of Sonora.Â 
We are an innovative and creative team of web applications and training. We make available our experience, technology and development techniques and training for the development of YOUR own solution
